filmography.title: Pool Sharks
filmography.role_description: Fields' silent screen debut where he performs his famous pool table routine while competing for a woman's hand.
filmography.plot: Two romantic rivals play a game of pool for the hand of their lady love, resulting in slapstick chaos.

filmography.title: Sally of the Sawdust
filmography.role_description: A kind-hearted circus juggler and con man who protects the orphan daughter of a disowned aristocrat.
filmography.plot: A circus juggler adopts a little girl when her mother dies and tries to reunite her with her wealthy grandparents.

filmography.title: It's the Old Army Game
filmography.role_description: A small-town pharmacist who gets entangled in a real estate scheme and a family picnic that goes awry.
filmography.plot: A pharmacist gets involved with a real estate scam while trying to manage his chaotic family life.

filmography.title: So's Your Old Man
filmography.role_description: A hapless inventor who tries to win respect from his town and family by impressing a visiting princess.
filmography.plot: A glazier invents a shatter-proof windshield and is ostracized by his town until he befriends a princess.

filmography.title: Running Wild
filmography.role_description: A timid, henpecked husband who is hypnotized into believing he is a lion, turning the tables on his tormentors.
filmography.plot: A cowardly man is accidentally hypnotized into being aggressive and assertive, changing his life overnight.

filmography.title: The Golf Specialist
filmography.role_description: A con man at a Florida hotel who attempts to teach the hotel detective's wife how to play golf.
filmography.plot: A con artist tries to avoid the house detective while giving a golf lesson that turns into a slapstick disaster.

filmography.title: Million Dollar Legs
filmography.role_description: The super-strong President of Klopstokia who enters the Olympics to save his bankrupt country.
filmography.plot: The President of a small country relies on his physical strength to dominate a cabinet conspiring against him.

filmography.title: If I Had a Million
filmography.role_description: An ex-juggler who uses a million-dollar windfall to buy a fleet of cars and take revenge on road hogs.
filmography.plot: A dying millionaire gives a million dollars to strangers; one recipient uses it to wage war on bad drivers.

filmography.title: The Dentist
filmography.role_description: An unconventional dentist who battles with uncooperative patients and a disapproving daughter.
filmography.plot: A dentist has a chaotic day dealing with eccentric patients and his daughter's desire to marry an ice man.

filmography.title: International House
filmography.role_description: A befuddled traveler who crashes his autogyro into a hotel in China, disrupting a convention.
filmography.plot: People gather at a hotel in China to bid on a new invention, television, but chaos ensues when Professor Quail arrives.

filmography.title: Tillie and Gus
filmography.role_description: A card shark who teams up with his ex-wife to help their niece win a boat race and an inheritance.
filmography.plot: A separated couple reunites to help their niece and nephew save their ferryboat business from a crooked lawyer.

filmography.title: The Fatal Glass of Beer
filmography.role_description: A Yukon prospector who parodies melodrama tropes in this surreal short film.
filmography.plot: A prospector in the snowy north sings a song about his wayward son, who returns home with stolen gold.

filmography.title: The Pharmacist
filmography.role_description: A harried pharmacist dealing with a demanding family and eccentric customers in his drugstore.
filmography.plot: A pharmacist tries to maintain his sanity while dealing with his nagging family and a series of odd customers.

filmography.title: The Barber Shop
filmography.role_description: A bumbling barber who tries to attract customers and accidentally catches a bank robber.
filmography.plot: A barber with a henpecked life tries to improve his business and ends up capturing an escaped convict.

filmography.title: Alice in Wonderland
filmography.role_description: The egg-shaped nursery rhyme character who pontificates to Alice in this star-studded adaptation.
filmography.plot: A live-action adaptation of Lewis Carroll's classic story featuring an all-star cast.

filmography.title: Six of a Kind
filmography.role_description: A crooked sheriff in a small Nevada town who swindles travelers with his pool-playing skills.
filmography.plot: Two couples traveling cross-country encounter a corrupt sheriff who complicates their journey.

filmography.title: You're Telling Me!
filmography.role_description: An eccentric inventor and social outcast who gains respect after a visiting princess befriends him.
filmography.plot: A struggling inventor is ridiculed by his town until a real princess helps him sell his puncture-proof tires.
filmography.awards: Remake of So's Your Old Man

filmography.title: The Old Fashioned Way
filmography.role_description: The leader of a theatrical troupe who uses his wits to stay one step ahead of the law and creditors.
filmography.plot: A con man leads a troupe of actors through small towns, dodging the sheriff while trying to put on a show.

filmography.title: Mrs. Wiggs of the Cabbage Patch
filmography.role_description: A man who is pursued by a spinster neighbor looking for a husband in this comedy-drama.
filmography.plot: A poor woman tries to raise her children and save her home, while her neighbor tries to snag a husband.

filmography.title: It's a Gift
filmography.role_description: A henpecked grocer who dreams of owning an orange grove in California despite his family's objections.
filmography.plot: A grocer sells his store and moves his family to California to run an orange grove, facing disasters along the way.

filmography.title: David Copperfield
filmography.role_description: The optimistic, perpetually indebted friend of David Copperfield in this acclaimed Dickens adaptation.
filmography.plot: A young man navigates life in Victorian England, encountering colorful characters like the kind but debt-ridden Mr. Micawber.

filmography.title: Mississippi
filmography.role_description: A riverboat captain who tries to teach a gentle singer (Bing Crosby) to be a tough guy.
filmography.plot: A disgraced pacifist joins a riverboat troupe and becomes a sensation when he acquires a reputation as a fighter.

filmography.title: Man on the Flying Trapeze
filmography.role_description: A henpecked husband who concocts an elaborate lie to take the day off work to see a wrestling match.
filmography.plot: A man dealing with a shrewish wife and mother-in-law tries to skip work to attend a wrestling match.

filmography.title: Poppy
filmography.role_description: A medicine show con man who tries to secure a fortune for his adopted daughter.
filmography.plot: A con man and his daughter arrive in a town where she falls in love with the mayor's son, and he tries to pass her off as an heiress.

filmography.title: The Big Broadcast of 1938
filmography.role_description: A dual role as two brothers involved in a transatlantic ocean liner race; features Bob Hope's debut song.
filmography.plot: Two ocean liners race across the Atlantic, with a variety of musical and comedy acts performing on board.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song (for Bob Hope's song)

filmography.title: You Can't Cheat an Honest Man
filmography.role_description: A debt-ridden circus owner who constantly battles with his ventriloquist dummy nemesis, Charlie McCarthy.
filmography.plot: A circus owner tries to stay one step ahead of the law and his creditors while dealing with his performers.

filmography.title: My Little Chickadee
filmography.role_description: A con man who enters a sham marriage with a woman (Mae West) who needs respectability to stay in town.
filmography.plot: A woman run out of town meets a con man on a train and they stage a marriage to gain respect and money.

filmography.title: The Bank Dick
filmography.role_description: A drunk who accidentally captures a bank robber and is hired as a security guard, leading to further mishaps.
filmography.plot: A henpecked drunkard accidentally thwarts a bank robbery and ends up a security guard, getting involved in an embezzlement scheme.

filmography.title: Never Give a Sucker an Even Break
filmography.role_description: A version of himself pitching a surreal movie script to a studio executive, featuring bizarre sequences.
filmography.plot: W.C. Fields plays himself, pitching a wild script to a movie studio while dealing with his niece and various eccentrics.
